attributes.action: allow buses and heavy goods vehicles to run on red diesel to help keep the cost of living down.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If buses and heavy goods vehicles were allowed to use red diesel prices in the shops would come down, and people would be able to afford to travel, thereby bringing inflation down.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
